definition: a culture containing yeast or bacteria that is used to start the process of fermentation or souring in making butter or cheese or dough
details:
noun
- a culture containing yeast or bacteria that is used to start the process of fermentation or souring in making butter or cheese or dough
= example: a culture containing yeast or bacteria that is used to start the process of fermentation or souring in making butter or cheese or dough
- a hand tool consisting of a rotating shaft with parallel handle
= synonyms: crank
- an electric motor for starting an engine
= synonyms: starter motor, starting motor
- food or drink to stimulate the appetite (usually served before a meal or as the first course)
= synonyms: appetizer
- any new participant in some activity
= synonyms: fledgling, freshman, fledgeling, entrant, neophyte, newcomer, newbie
- the official who signals the beginning of a race or competition
= synonyms: dispatcher
- a contestant in a team sport who is in the game at the beginning
